overview:
Gregory Macfarlane’s responsibilities include overseeing all financial activities for Ceridian Corporation and providing key leadership support to the CEO & Chairman, and Board of Directors. He was formally appointed an Executive Vice President and Chief Financial Officer for the company March 26, 2007 and was instrumental in taking the company from a NYSE public company to a privately held company at the end of 2007.

Macfarlane is an experienced executive with a strong track record of leadership and results with a core expertise in the financial services and business services industry. Macfarlane has been consistently recognized throughout his career for leadership, results, teamwork and innovative thinking.

relationships.title: Executive Vice President and Chief Financial Officer
